page.title: 12Local Transport.
page.content: The part of Lincolnshire that i live in is mostly flat although you would not think so if you have to cycle a lot of the time.Even some of the small hills can be very tiring.My Dad does not like driving on the country roads because he says that there are far too many bends.The roads do have a lot of right angled bends because there are lots of drainage ditches and hedges that stop them going in a straight line. In the winter time there are lots of minor accidents on the small country roads because the weather can get very bad at times.It gets so bad at times that the school buses do not come out to take us to school.I feel really unhappy when this happens!Last year our neighbour drove into a ditch during heavy snow and he had to be pulled out by a tractor the next day.
